description:
Today on a horrifying episode of real ghost stories online that some claim was the inspiration for the hit cartoon, Muppet Babies, and the unreleased episode where Kermit and Fozzy play with a wee-gee board, summon a demon, gonzo becomes possessed and carries out a mass murder of nanny, ralph, scooter and miss piggy. For some reason that episode never aired, despite the desperate cries of children to see the truth, behind the Muppet babies.Â 

What happens late at night inside the bathroom of an old soup kitchen?Â 

Something that doesnâ€™t involve the living, but rather, the dead.Â 

Waiting for their next time to strike and unsuspecting soul.Â 

That story, and much more, today, on Real Ghost Stories Online.
